param.name: usertype
param.label: User types allowed
param.description: Users types allowed for use mail send (; between each type)

param.name: groupaccess
param.label: Group name of allowed users
param.description: HecMailing group name which contain users allowed to use send mail

param.name: send_all
param.label: Send to all users
param.description: if NO, users can't send email to all users, FIRST for first in list and LAST for last in list

param.name: ask_select_group
param.label: Ask select group
param.description: if YES, a dummy 'select' line is added in group list and selected by default

param.name: backup_mail
param.label: Backup sent e-mail
param.description: if YES, all sent e-mail will be saved.

param.name: default_use_profil
param.label: Use profil check as default
param.description: if YES, 'use profil' checkbox is checked by default.

param.name: image_incorpore
param.label: Image in content by Default
param.description: if YES, 'Image in content' checkbox is checked by default.

param.name: send_to_blocked
param.label: Send mail to blocked users?
param.description: if YES, mails are sent to blocked user.
param.option: YES, IF ALL USERS OR JOOMLA GROUP

param.name: attach_path
param.label: Attachment path
param.description: Folder where attachment files will be saved

param.name: edit_width
param.label: Editor width
param.description: Width in px of the editor

param.name: captcha_use
param.label: Use captcha?
param.description: if YES, the captcha will be used

param.name: captcha_private_key
param.label: ReCaptcha private Key
param.description: Go to http://recaptcha.net/ to get yours keys

param.name: captcha_public_key
param.label: ReCaptcha public Key
param.description: Go to http://recaptcha.net/ to get yours keys

param.name: captcha_theme
param.label: Captcha Theme
param.description: Choose the theme of the contact captcha

param.name: captcha_show_logged
param.label: Show for logged user
param.description: if YES, the captcha will shown for logged users
